title: (x) What's that e? - Bodoni (stretched) {Chesh}
content: I tried all the fonts in my system and none of them matches although one of them created it. I am pissed and I would appreciate any help. Thank you.. ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525174704im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/36786.jpg)
author: phoebe

comments.content:
THANK you oh CHESHIREDAVE oh so much thank you   
(plus, imressed i am)

Here you go -- at this size, I think it's Bauer Bodoni Italic at 515pt, 130% width (font is laid over the original graphic):
